short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates xpaths for UI elements on the webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LocatorGPT is an innovative tool designed to save you time and effort by generating stable and reliable locators for automation testing with just a single click.

Key Features:

Get Locators for all element on a webpage with their logical name:
Quickly generate a comprehensive list of all active locators on the current webpage.
Logical names are assigned to each locator, making them easy to understand and integrate into your projects. Export locators in a convenient JSON format for seamless usage. Copy all locators effortlessly using the "Copy to Clipboard" functionality.

Get Individual Locator for a web element with its logical name :

Hover over any web element for 2 seconds to instantly display its locator value and logical name.
Copy individual locators directly from the display or access them via the browserâ€™s console tab.
